Texts.Chs: 把^orange;超级靶向芯片^reset;带到^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给我。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Hyper Targeting Chip^reset; to me at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 干得好。你能在战火中幸存，这证明了你的战斗能力。我不想惹你。
Texts.Eng: Good job. The fact that you survived that firepower says much of your prowess in battle. I would not want to mess with you.

Texts.Chs: 在^orange;赛博^reset;或者^orange;荒漠^reset;行星上经常行走着危险的战斗机器，被称为^orange;战争机器^reset;。干掉一个，我会付给你满意的报酬。
Texts.Eng: On ^orange;Cyber Spheres^reset; or ^orange;Wasteland^reset; planets there often walk dangerous battle machines known as ^orange;War Bots^reset;. Take one down, and I'll pay you well.
